article_title: How a police raid on Columbia protest ignited campus movement
sentence: "  US  college  campuses  have  been  a  flashpoint  for  Gaza  war  protests  since  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  -  mostly  civilians  -  and  taking  253  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.
